item.title: The difference between Thread.sleep() and Task.sleep()
item.description: I wish more people would watch the WWDC videos and read the docs before forming an opinion on the new Swift concurrency APIs; but it’s understandable if they don’t, given very few apps can afford to only target iOS15 and macOS12 â€” yet to be released platforms. So here’s the simplest example I could think of, that could start explaining the new async/await & concurrency model without actually going into details.
